body: "Consider the comforts in your home. Carpet. Furniture. Microwaves. Insulation from the cold and heat. Water that won’t make you and your family sick. Privacy. Now imaging your life without these things. For some it seems impossible. This is how people live every single day in La Limonada," concludes Kerry Smith in a post about her visit to three homes in one of the poorest and most dangerous neighbourhoods in Guatemala City.
